attributes.action: Parking and Telephone costs at Hospitals
attributes.additional_details:
Why, do ordinary people have to pay for hospital parking and for that matter why do the staff in some hospitals have to pay too?
Why, do you have to ring a higher rate number to contact the ward that is looking after your loved one?
Why, are these companies allowed to profit from the misfortune of others?
What, will the government do to resolve these issues?
When will the house review all hospital parking and telephone costs as across the country and not on an individual hospital to hospital basis.
